definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 1:2 collector (of sentences), or (AV RV) preacher (concionator Jer.: e)kklhsiasth/v LXX (member of an e)kklhsi/a); fem. either of office, Ges:§ 122 r De Now Che, cf. [[סׂפֶרֶת]] Ezr 2:55; xaliyfah;un, Khalif; Germ. Majestät, Excellenz; or as in Ar. with intensive force, one realizing the idea in its completeness (cf. jam=a9ah;un great collector, ba0qirah;un deep investigator (formed like [[קׂהֶלֶת]]), W:AG i. § 233 R. c. v. Dr:Intr. 466; RVm great orator): hence either convener, or great collector (of sentences), cf. [[בַּעֲלֵי אֲסֻפּוֹת]] Ec 12:11, [[למעא דברי חפץ]] ´[[בקּשׁ ק]]: v:Ec 12:10 (but Kö:Einl. 428 Dr:l. c. al. speaker in assembly, Plumptre debater));—´[[ק]]: a king in Jerus., son of David, prob. = Sol., the pseudonym of book of Ec.: Ec 1:1, v:Ec 1:2 (appos. of [[אֲנִי]]), called [[חכם]] Ec 12:9, cf. v:Ec 12:10; ´[[אמר ק]]: Ec 1:2, ´[[אמר הק]]: Ec 12:8 = Ec 7:27 for MT ´[[אמרה ק]]:.
